    Token {
        kind: OpenTag(
            Full,
        ),
        span: (
            1,
            1,
        ),
    },
    Token {
        kind: Class,
        span: (
            2,
            1,
        ),
    },

        kind: Identifier(
            "MyClass",
        ),
        span: (
            2,
            7,
        ),
    },
    Token {
        kind: LeftBrace,
        span: (
            2,
            15,
        ),
    },
    Token {
        kind: Protected,
        span: (
            3,
            5,
        ),
    },
    Token {
        kind: Variable(
            "a",
        ),
        span: (
            3,
            15,
        ),
    },
    Token {
        kind: SemiColon,
        span: (
            3,
            17,
        ),
    },
    Token {
        kind: Comment(
            "// my comment",
        ),
        span: (
            4,
            5,
        ),
    },
    Token {
        kind: RightBrace,
        span: (
            5,
            1,
        ),
    },
]
